verbs.description: BEIJING ( AP ) — China [V: has] balked at stepping up its purchases of American products , raising the odds of a trade war , if President Donald Trump follows through on his threat to tax

BEIJING ( AP ) — [ARG0: China] has [V: balked] [ARG1: at stepping up its purchases of American products] , [ARGM-ADV: raising the odds of a trade war , if President Donald Trump follows through on his threat to tax]
